name: Deadly Voltage: Rise of the Invincible
summary: Rescue a small town from the grips of an unbelievable invasion in Deadly Voltage - Rise of the Invincible, an exciting science fiction tale. A routine package delivery to an out-of-the-way town turns into one of the most shocking events ever experienced. As you arrive, you realise that all of the townspeople are mind-controlled pawns and an army of robots is running loose.
